Text: Do you have the 2nd by chance by weirr?

This author is unknown to me and to... Google! More info needed. The only calculus author I know going by this name (spelling?) is Maurice D. Weir who has been the coauthor of Thomas' Calculus, now in its 12th ed. and available on TPB (along with solution manual).

Thank you so much! This is a high quality PDF of exactly the textbook I needed for the next two semesters of Calculus. It looks beautiful on my iPad, and rather than renting from the Nook or Kindle applications for $100+, I now own the textbook in a digital format. Thanks again.
Larson Edwards is actually two authors, those are their last names. This is a rather popular Calculus course book, second maybe to the Stewart book
